verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus shall reign where'er the sun does its successive journeys run; His kingdom stretch from shore to shore, till moons shall wax and wane no more.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: To Him shall endless pray'r be made, and endless praises crown his Head; His name like sweet perfume shall rise with ev'ry morning sacrifice.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: People and realms of ev'ry tongue dwell on His love with sweetest song, and infant voices shall proclaim their early blessings on His name.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Blessings abound where'er He reigns; the pris'ners leap to lose their chains, the weary find eternal rest, and all who suffer want are blessed.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Let ev'ry creature rise and bring their grateful honors to our King. Angels descend with songs again, and earth repeat the loud "Amen!"
